thread.title: William
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by William

author: William
title: William
text: I have to admit I was a little reluctant to order a vape on line again, as the last one that I purchased from a major supplier/brand only lasted 8 months despite good reviews on there site. After reviewing multiple reviews for the next purchase and deciding on the Boundless CF, you guys had the best price that I could find plus free shipping and bonus gifts. I received the product two days after ordering, outstanding! Great service and easy to use site. Thank you.
